definition: moderately affluent/well-off/a period of peace and prosperity
Xiaokang, a Confucian near-ideal state of society, second only to Datong 大同[Da4 tong2]
society in which the material needs of most citizens are adequately met

sentences.english: It remains a historical mission for China to accelerate the process of urbanization, which will enable the nation to move towards moderate prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 大力推进城市化，是中国奔向小康社会的历史重任。

sentences.english: The most difficult and onerous tasks to build a well-off society comprehensively focus on rural area.
sentences.chinese: 全面建设小康社会，最艰巨最繁重的任务在农村。

sentences.english: The first 20 years of the 21st century represents an important strategic period for China to achieve all-round construction of a better-off society and to speed up its socialist modernization.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪头20年，是中国全面建设小康社会。

sentences.english: Joyce's day-off tips have gone straight to the local food pantry.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯的一天小康提醒曾经持续向本地粮食茶水。

sentences.english: The construction of political civilization is one of the most important standards for building comfortably-off society in an all-round way.
sentences.chinese: 政治文明建设是全面建设小康社会的一个重要标准。

sentences.english: During the 16th Party Congess, the CPC put forward the goal of completely building a Well-off society.
sentences.chinese: 党的十六大提出了全面建设小康社会的目标。

sentences.english: Many farmers are busy in the fields, though they are well-off.
sentences.chinese: 许多农人在田里忙碌着，虽然他们都已奔小康。

sentences.english: The current 12th Five-year Plan period is a critical stage in China's efforts to build a society of initial prosperity in all respects.
sentences.chinese: “十二五”是中国全面建设小康社会的关键时期。

sentences.english: There will be more and more people living a well-to-do life.
sentences.chinese: 会有越来越多的人过上小康生活的。

sentences.english: This is in 2020, well-off life I.
sentences.chinese: 这就是2020年，小康生活的我。

sentences.english: The foot pushes off evenly at the end of the gait cycle with mild pronation.
sentences.chinese: 足部推动小康均匀，在去年底的步态周期轻旋。

sentences.english: Problems is house-building and their countermeasures are analysed and studied in detail…
sentences.chinese: 最后提出住房建设是奔小康的标志性工程。

sentences.english: He comes from a well-off family.
The realization of overall comfortably-off society is closely related to the coordinated development of health services.
sentences.chinese: 小康社会的全面达成离不开卫生事业的协调发展。

sentences.english: To completely build a "Xiaokang Society " in China, an appropriate universal-type social welfare system is a fundamental requirement.
sentences.chinese: 适度普惠型社会福利制度是全面建设小康社会的要求。

sentences.english: There is no love between Ah-jung and May while Hsiao-kang falls love with Ah-jung.
sentences.chinese: 阿荣和梅之间没什么爱情，但小康却爱上了阿荣。

definition: society in which the material needs of most citizens are adequately met
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
to lift oneself out of poverty
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
to become rich by one's own efforts/self-made
household with savings or annual income of 10,000 yuan or more (considered a large amount in the 1970s, when the term became established)
